ygData.subject: Long complicated details
ygData.msgSnippet: Veratis was trying to word together the proper response in understandable terms. I had to remove your spark from Lunarpines, you are in a newborn protoform,

Veratis was trying to word together the proper response in 
understandable terms.

"I had to remove your spark from Lunarpines, you are in a newborn 
protoform, The DNA scanners are trying to assimilate the DNA I 
imprinted and programmed to reject it. When Lunarpine returns your 
owl DNA will be the secondary scan. Since your form won't accept the 
primary form it'll pick the secondary. You will be reborn and 
flightworthy in no time." He didn't expect her to fully 
understand,Protoforms don't usually have thier instincts and grasp of 
reality until thier transformed. He'd hoped that since she was 
already activated that her logic systems were fuly operational.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She was very frightened and felt her fear start to consume her. She 
> tried to remain calm, but wasn't very successful. "I..I thank you 
for 
> your help Veratis. But how is it that I can communicate with you 
and 
> not with Lunarpine? I felt his connection, then it was lost. What 
is 
> happening?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Veratis smiled, he'd achieved communication with a new form.
> > 
> > "I am Veratis, Lunarpine left you in my care until he returned 
with 
> > some of your old DNA. I'm giving you your life back."
> > 
> > Outside the link Veratis knew that all favors must one day be 
> > returned.
> >
